name: Grifford Academy
storyline:
Welcome to Grifford Academy
Dive into the enigmatic world of Grifford Academy, a mesmerizing coming-of-age RPG where magic, monsters, and teenage turmoil collide. Join Erika, Viva, and Cap as they navigate the mystical book realm of Caldria, uncovering secrets and battling sinister forces.

Immersive World-Building
Explore the beautifully crafted realm of Caldria, filled with menacing creatures and otherworldly discoveries. Equip your squad, level up, and immerse yourself in strategic turn-based combat.

Your Choices Matter
Guide your characters through personal challenges and watch them evolve based on your decisions. Every choice matters, influencing the story and the characters' development in unexpected ways. Engage with a unique dialogue flow that allows you to connect with the characters and their journey at your own pace.

Strategic Turn-Based Combat
Equip your squad, level up, and immerse yourself in strategic turn-based combat. Grifford Academy offers both Story Mode for a relaxed experience and Strategy Mode for those seeking a challenge.

Welcome to a journey where heart meets strategy and every battle counts.
summary: Grifford Academy is a story-rich, coming-of-age RPG set in a mystical book realm where your decisions shape the personalities of the characters. Engage in strategic turn-based combat as you set out to discover the secrets of Caldria.
